sentences.en: Aversion phenomena are shown by fungi other than basidiomycetes.
sentences.cn: 排斥现象除担子菌外也曾由其它真菌证实过.

sentences.en: Cats are an aversion of hers.
Cats have a natural aversion to water.
He had an aversion to anything that savored of the supernatural.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌任何带有超自然意味的东西.

sentences.en: He had an aversion to getting up early.
He has a strong aversion to dogs.
He has an aversion to ( seeing ) cockfights.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌 ( 看 ) 斗鸡.

sentences.en: He took an aversion to me.
I underwent aversion therapy for my addiction to smoking.
sentences.cn: 我因为吸烟成瘾接受了厌恶疗法的治疗.

sentences.en: It was impossible to remove that riveted aversion I had to him.
sentences.cn: 要除去我对他所怀的极深的厌恶,那是办不到的.

sentences.en: Many people have a natural and emotional aversion to insects.
Selective aversion to certain risks may entail acceptance of other greater risks.
sentences.cn: 有选择地回避某些风险可能招致更大的风险.

sentences.en: She felt an aversion to him.
She looked at Pen with glances from which beamed pride, defiance, aversion.
sentences.cn: 她望着潘,目光流露出高傲 、 蔑视和反感.

sentences.en: The language of desire, and aversion, is imperative.
sentences.cn: 欲望与嫌恶所用的语言是命令式的.

trans.tran_en: a strong dislike of something or someone
